title:
I have kept copies of the Star News from May 29, 2010.  In two parts of the paper are small sections of paper about 2 inches square which seem to be pasted onto the regular newspaper BUT they hold exactly the words and pictures that would be in the paper - if the sections were not there.



By now the newspaper is getting it\'s old grey look but the pasted on section are still bright white.



What are these?



Thanks



Alan Perry
text: I don't know what you're referring to here.
